channel.title: [ON A RAIL] Can see "inactive" soldiers around Rocket
channel.description:
Near the bottom of the rocket silo, there are two HECU soldiers who only charge after the player once they get close to rounding the corner. Before this, they're inactive and invisible.
By jumping on the railing just to the left of the entrance to the silo, the player can peek around the corner and see both of them - or rather, their weapons/accessories. Since they're inactive, they won't react to the player's presence.
